abstract: Scene at Monterey Car Week in Monterey, Calif, late-summer event where wealthy collectors peruse and purchase vintage cars, described.
lead_paragraph: Auctioneers sell vintage Ferraris and Porsches to semi-retired car aficionados (including Jay Leno) and younger Silicon Valley hotshots along the California coast.

headline.main: Sold! In Monterey, the Ferrari Crowd Shells Out $402 Million
headline.print_headline: A Deluxe Traffic Jam in Monterey

snippet: Auctioneers sell vintage Ferraris and Porsches to semi-retired car aficionados (including Jay Leno) and younger Silicon Valley hotshots along the California coast.
